title: On Baseball: It’s Unsafe at Second, and Some Want New Rules for Slides
text:
Published By: NYTimes Baseball - Today 
After Chase Utley’s hard, late slide on Saturday that broke the leg of the Mets’ Ruben Tejada, Major League Baseball may change the rule...
